Articles.Content:
I made a small tribute video to KSP 1.0:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/etOFH_6u0uI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 
The music is my own work, if anyone asks.

Ohhh its look descent. The pics I think could've transitioned faster but the concept was nice. Great job! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Hype Train VIP? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Ohhh its look descent. The pics I think could've transitioned faster but the concept was nice. Great job! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Hype Train VIP? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Naah, I'm just a passenger.

Also, the transitions speed up near the end to match the pace of the music
